name: accessibletabs
description: This is static application that has been created to showcase html tabs which conform to accessibility guidelines laid down by W3C (https://www.w3.org/TR/wai-aria-practices-1.1/#tabpanel). This application consists of following three files: * index.html - Main file that displays tabs in browser * js/tabs.js - Contains javascript code to handle tab navigation * css/tabs.css - Contains styling changes for web page.
